DOC.brief_summary: The goal KNOW-CKD ( KoreaN cohort study Outcome patient With Chronic Kidney Disease ) study 1 ) establish CKD cohort represent Korean CKD population 10-year follow-up , 2 ) investigate renal progression , mortality , complication , risk factor , role biochemical parameter genetic influence . KNOW-CKD Research Group comprise nephrologists , pediatric nephrologists , epidemiologist statisticians eleven center Korea . KNOW-CKD enroll 2,850 individual CKD stage 1 5 2011 2015 follow 10 year . Dialyzed patient allograft kidney exclude . At enrollment pre-specified interval , laboratory test conduct kidney function , biochemical profile , anemia , cardiovascular complication ( echocardiography , coronary CT , arterial stiffness ) , mineral bone disorder . A biobank also establish DNA , serum urine regular interval . Information medical history , health questionnaire , QoL also collect . Web-based case-report form ( CRF ) develop systemic management patient data .
DOC.brief_title: KoreaN Cohort Study Outcome Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease : A 10-year Longitudinal Cohort Study Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: Age : > 20 < 75 yr , CKD stage 1 5 predialysis Unable unwilling give consent Previously receive chronic dialysis Previous organ transplant Heart failure Known liver cirrhosis past current cancer Pregnant woman Single kidney due trauma donation
